title: Blackout
body:
When i open League Of Legends i see the normal front page and it works when i click the Launch buttom. But when it should open to the login screen instead there is only black on the League page. 
Can you guys help me with this?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), let me know if this helps.
